import React from 'react'; export default function Basket(props) { const { cartItems, onAdd, onRemove } = props; const taxPrice = cartItems.prezzo * 0.14; const totalPrice = cartItems.reduce((a,c)=> a + c.prezzo *c.qty,0); return (
